prev
next
146m²  752.400m²REF PV-T-550

It is supplied with water from the Irrigation Channel and the Public network. Electricity is from the public grid.

elements.contents:
318.500€
House/Villa 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique
prev
next
136m²  308,70m²REF PV-M-545

Sale
Picturesque building renovated in 2020. Renovation included structure and new roof. The building is divided into 3 fractions (Studio, T1 and T2) Very versatile space, which allows immediate profitability of the space. The renovation was carried out respecting the environment and using natural materials You will immediately feel at home, with the colors, textures and good vibe. Charming place where you can live with your family and friends 15 minutes from Aljezur and only 20 minutes from the main beaches

prev
next
Sold
200m²  552.750m²REF PV-T-523

Sale
Property situated on the Costa Vicentina, close to Odeceixe and 8.5 km from Aljezur. Easy access, about 1.5 km from EN 120. With a Unique Natural Beauty, having several clusters of trees, pinetrees and corkoak trees, a charming Spring and nooks overlooking the Serra de Monchique. The ruin, benefits from excellent sun exposure, and can be enlarged up to 300sqm. With great potential in the development of a Rural Tourism (600sqm), Reforestation and/or Agricultural Project. Water and Electricity from public network.
